resp = client.sql.query(
    format="txt",
    query="SELECT YEAR(release_date) AS year FROM library WHERE page_count > ? AND author = ? GROUP BY year HAVING COUNT(*) > ?",
    params=[
        300,
        "Frank Herbert",
        0
    ],
)
print(resp)
